name: GETLBL
description: This command will return the line number of a label for future use in the GOTOL (Goto Line) or GOSUBL (Gosub Line) command.

parameters.name: label_name
parameters.description: The label name you want to convert to a line number.

parameters.name: receiving_field
parameters.description: The field that will receive the line number. Must be of type I.
